FormDefinition.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <cms:formdefinition xmlns="http://www.composite.net/ns/management/bindingforms/std.ui.controls.lib/1.0" xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/management/bindingforms/std.function.lib/1.0" xmlns:cms="http://www.composite.net/ns/management/bindingforms/1.0"> <cms:bindings> <cms:binding name="NewsletterType" type="Composite.Community.Newsletter.Data.Types.INewsletterType" /> <cms:binding name="NewsletterTypeMarkup" type="System.String" /> </cms:bindings> <cms:layout> <TabPanels PreSelectedIndex="1"> <FieldGroup Label="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.LabelFieldGroup}"> <TextBox Label="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.Title}" Help="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.TitleHelp}"> <TextBox.Text> <cms:bind source="NewsletterType.Title" /> </TextBox.Text> </TextBox> <TextArea Label="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.Description}" Help="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.DescriptionHelp}"> <TextArea.Text> <cms:bind source="NewsletterType.Description" /> </TextArea.Text> </TextArea> <TextBox Label="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.DefaultFromName}" Help="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.DefaultFromNameHelp}"> <TextBox.Text> <cms:bind source="NewsletterType.DefaultFromName" /> </TextBox.Text> </TextBox> <TextBox Label="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.DefaultFromEmail}" Help="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.DefaultFromEmailHelp}"> <TextBox.Text> <cms:bind source="NewsletterType.DefaultFromEmail" /> </TextBox.Text> </TextBox> <TextBox Label="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.DefaultReplyToEmail}" Help="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.DefaultReplyToEmailHelp}"> <TextBox.Text> <cms:bind source="NewsletterType.DefaultReplyToEmail" /> </TextBox.Text> </TextBox> <TextBox Label="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.DefaultSubject}" Help="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.DefaultSubjectHelp}"> <TextBox.Text> <cms:bind source="NewsletterType.DefaultSubject" /> </TextBox.Text> </TextBox> <DataReferenceTreeSelector Label="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.UnsubscribePage}" Help="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.UnsubscribePageHelp}" Handle="Composite.Management.PageIdSelectorDialog" DataType="Composite.Data.Types.IPage,Composite" NullValueAllowed="false"> <DataReferenceTreeSelector.Selected> <cms:bind source="NewsletterType.UnsubscribePage" /> </DataReferenceTreeSelector.Selected> </DataReferenceTreeSelector> </FieldGroup> <TabPanels.Label> <cms:read source="NewsletterType.Title" /> </TabPanels.Label> <MarkupEditor Label="${Composite.Community.Newsletter, NewsletterType.Layout}"> <cms:bind source="NewsletterTypeMarkup" /> </MarkupEditor> </TabPanels> </cms:layout> </cms:formdefinition>
